titles.title: SERVe Act
Support Earned Recognition for Veterans Act

A bill to amend titles 5 and 38, United States Code, to clarify the veteran status of an individual based on the attendance of the individual at a preparatory school of a service academy, and for other purposes.
SERVe Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Support Earned Recognition for Veterans Act or the SERVe Act - Excludes from the definitions of "active duty," "active duty for training," and "inactive duty training," for veteran benefit or employment preference purposes, any service performed at a preparatory school of a service academy by a student who is not otherwise a member of the Armed Forces.
